analyzed: catur dharma uddāna sūtram
kha saṃskṛte punar uddhṛ
bhāratīya bhāṣāyām
ārya sāgaranāgarājaparipṛcchā nāma mahāyāna sūtram
bhoṭa bhāṣā yām phagpa gpā kluyi gya lapogya chosi uspā yes
jā vā thek pā chen po īm daḥ
namaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ
evam mayā śrutam

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṃghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgara nāga rāja āvasathe viharati sma sārddham sārdha dvādaśa śata bhikṣūṇām mahā saṃghena bahubhiḥ ca bodhisattva mahāsattvaiḥ
tasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgara nāga rājam avocat nāga adhipate

original: caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: caturṇām dharma uddānānām abhidhāne kriyamāṇe tad abhidhānena caturaśīti dharma skandha sahasrāṇām abhidhānam kṛtam bhavati
katamāni catvāri tathā hi

original: sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām anityatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
analyzed: sarveṣām saṃskārāṇām anitya tāyām bodhisattvānam mahāsattvānām nirdiṣṭam akṣaya jñānam pravartate

original: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rnirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
analyzed: sarveṣām sa āsravāṇām dharmāṇām duḥkha tāyām bodhisattvānam mahāsattvānām

original: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām anātmatāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
analyzed: sarveṣām dharmāṇām anātma tāyām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām nirdiṣṭam akṣaya jñānam pravartate
nirvāṇasya śānta tāyām bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ nirdiṣṭam akṣaya jñānam pravartate
nāga adhipate

original: eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: eteṣām caturṇām dharma uddānānām abhidhāne kriyamāṇe tad abhidhānena caturaśīti dharma skandha sahasrāṇām abhidhānam kṛtam bhavati
idam avocat bhagavān

original: āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti |
analyzed: ātta manasaḥ bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvāḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
ārya sāgara nāga rājaparipṛcchā nāma mahāyāna sūtram samāptam

original: bhāratīyopādhyāyena surendrabodhinā mahālocāvā-vandejñānasenena cedamanūditaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ ca |
analyzed: bhāratīya upādhyāyena surendrabodhinā mahālocau āvande jñānasenena ca idam anūditam vyavasthāpitam ca
bhavatu sarva maṅgalam
